snippet: Amid accusations of abuse against two teachers, a Los Angeles school removes them all. Is that how you would want your child's school to respond?
abstract: Amid accusations of abuse against two teachers, a Los Angeles school removes them all. Is that how you would want your child's school to respond?
lead_paragraph: Imagine, for a moment, that a teacher - or worse, two - at your child's school was accused of some form of child sexual abuse involving students. What action would you want the school to take?

headline.main: Two Teachers Accused. All Teachers Dismissed.
